name: HexPloration: Epistle 3
description:
This is an in-progress isometric hex grid game based on the Epistle 3 plot summary by Marc Laidlaw.

The space is meant to be explored, and for now that is all that works. I have many other features planned but they are either not done, or too buggy.

Feel free to leave comments below, and enjoy!

Basic control:

  • Left click on Gordon and then Right click on an open/navigable hex to walk there.
